title: Synthesis of large-sized spherical Co–C alloys with soft magnetic properties though a high-pressure solid-state metathesis reaction
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7490-7498
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08967C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xu Jia, Leilei Zhang, Yi Tian, Binbin Wu, Yu Tao, Duanwei He, Baocheng Yang, Filippo S. Boi, Li Lei
This study reports a novel high-pressure solid-state metathesis (HSM) reaction to produce spherical bulk (diameters 2–4 mm) Co–C alloys (Co3C and Co1−xCx) and a study of the formation and decomposition behaviors of spherical Co–C alloys under high temperature and pressure conditions.
